body.name: Clear Collective Balancing Capsule Toner from Hero Cosmetics - Daily Facial Toner for All Skin Types, Hydrating Serum for Redness Relief and Dry Skin, Fragrance and Paraben Free (4.40 fl oz)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 20 hrs 34 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbonfree Certified determine the carbon footprint of the product, and associated carbon emissions are offset with reduction projects.

features: Skin-perfecting Daily Facial Toner -- The Clear Collective Balancing Capsule Toner tunes up skin’s oil-moisture balance for bouncy, velvety soft skin for oily skin, dry skin and acne prone skin.
The Hero Difference -- From the brand that brought you the award-winning Mighty Patch, our pore-refining toner is step two in your daily routine for clear skin.
Acne Toner Handles 3 Common Acne-prone Skin Issues -- Skin toner that: mattifies and refines pores; offers redness relief for dry skin; and fortifies the skin’s moisture barrier.
Zero Fragrance Or Irritating Ingredients -- Free of drying alcohols, parabens, fragrance, artificial colors and silicones, this hydrating toner is safe for all skin types.
Feels Amazing -- The unique serum-meets-toner formula hydrates and fights shine at the same time for bouncy, velvety soft skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been on the hunt for a god toner and I’ve finally found the one I’ll be buying again! I have normal/combination skin, large pores on cheeks, and light acne. I’ve been going through many different toners, some worked okay but I felt weren’t making that much of a difference to buy again. This toner popped up on my recommended products and I did my research on it and wanted to try it. It’s got wonderful clean ingredients and I loved the idea of it being a toner/serum, and the product size vs. cost is *chefs kiss*. You also don’t need a lot, one good shake, about a dime size amount, spreads nicely over my face. I’ve been using it for a couple weeks now and OMG. Literally saw the results immediately. My pores look so much smoother and refined, my skin is GLOWING in the morning! I’ve also been using this with the cosrx snail mucin essence which I feel has been a game changing combination for my skin. It also feels calming and cool on the face. FINALLY have found the toner I’ll be buying again. The price point, size, ingredients, results, it’s all a 5 star from me, I couldn’t recommend this enough.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: At first, I thought this might be a little gimmicky- there are so many new skincare products that don't really do anything. I heard this was a dupe for the Fenty Fat Water, so I wanted to give it a fair shot.I immediately purchased a second bottle upon emptying the first one.This is a beautiful toner and serum in one. I use this directly after showering/washing my face, and have noticed a significant difference in the quality of my skin. It's moisturizing and balancing, and leaves my skin plump and smooth. It has lightened dark spots and calmed occasional blemishes. It is a perfect canvas for moisturizer and makeup. I got a solid 6 weeks of daily use out of one bottle. This has quickly become a staple in my collection, and for $12 bucks, it's worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t really see much difference
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this mostly because I needed my face to brighten up a little but I did not really see any effect for about a week and half , and it did irritate my skin sometimes when I used it good thing is it did not come with any strong smell and did not leave my skin dry , but I will try using it for a month or two again to see if it will make any difference

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have recently revamped my skin care regimen. Morning time I was using a $160 serum and my skin was red, congested and very broken out. 3 days using this and my redness has calmed down, acne is gone and my skin is GLOWING. I can’t believe it. I love everything about this product, especially the price point. It’s everything I care about (quality and standards) at a great price point. Highly recommend for sensitive acne prone skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on skin that feels painfully dry out of the shower
reviews.reviewText: Whenever I get out of the shower, my face feels like a tight mask. It's the worst. Putting this stuff on while my face is still a little moist totally prevents that from happening! It's great stuff and has lasted me a really long time. I have super dry skin and combining this stuff with some deep moisturizer has made a big difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just ok for my skin
reviews.reviewText: I personally didn’t notice a difference in using this toner (I went through 2 bottles just to make sure), but it also hasn’t broken my sensitive skin out either so that’s a win

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product helped balance my skin tone!
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin with atopic eczema and using this has really reduced the amount of breakouts I get on my face. The scent is mild but not overbearing, and the texture is like a more gelatinous serum with beads. It does moisturize, and sometimes I leave out my regular moisturizer.Overall, I used it over the course of 30 days to test and really saw my acne (which was minimal, so I'm not sure how it works for severe acne) and eczema reduce. I've maybe had one patch of eczema and two acne spots in the last three months. My skin tone has become more balanced and the toner really seeps into my skin, making it feel very soft and bouncy.10/10 would recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best toner I have ever used.
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is awesome. I am in my early thirties and have combination skin. Sometimes it's dry, sometimes oily, sometimes I break out, sometimes I don't. Finding something consistent for my skin had been difficult. This toner is the best I've used and along with the prebiotic moisturizer these work wonderfully together. My skin feels soft and moisturized. My pores aren't as noticeable. My random cystic spots are clearing and I haven't had any new blemishes since using this product. I highly recommend this. I wish I had these products as a teenager, but am still pleased I discovered them at 33. Hero is 100% worth a try.
